name: My Dear Son
description:
DESCRIPTION:

Lewis sees his life and the life of his family change dramatically after his mother is infected with a deadly pandemic.
You would enjoy the last moments with those you love?

A short game, done with great care and a great lesson behind it.

In honor of everyone who has died from a virus or disease.

Enjoy every moment with the one you love!!!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

PRICE:

The game is free, but I am totally open to donations, which I will invest in my future projects, to bring more and more original games!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

SUGGESTIONS:

The game are open to suggestions and constructive criticism!
I want to improve my work even more, and in the future launch a great game!
Thank you all!!!
